biotools.summary: CNN-SVR is a deep learning-based method for CRISPR/Cas9 guide RNA (gRNA) on-target cleavage efficacy prediction. It is composed of two major components: a merged CNN as the front-end for extracting gRNA and epigenetic features as well as an SVR as the back-end for regression and predicting gRNA cleavage efficiency.
